summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3012, for the improvement of Olive Street, from 9th Avenue to the east line of Howard Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36226 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
